package.name: arlobot_rviz_launchers
package.description: arlobot_rviz_launchers is a copy of turtlebot_rviz_launchers modified for use on the Parallax ArloBot NOTE: It may not contain all of the files from turtlebot_rviz_launchers, only those that I was not able to directly source from the turtlebot package in my program.
package.author: Chris L8
